description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Histoire de Cognac, Jarnac, Segonzac et d'un grand nombre de localités entre Saintes et Château-neuf, Archiac et Rouillac Pons et Saint-Jean-d'Angély, dans leurs rapports avec l'histoire générale de la France depuis les temps celtiques jusqu'à l'an 1882" Author: COUSIN, Eugène. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10169.k.4." Page: 77 Place of Publishing: Bordeaux Date of Publishing: 1882 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000802396 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
